## MsgHandlerManager.addHandler() method

Add message handler, duplicate handlers to the same `msgName` would be ignored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addHandler(msgName: string, handler: Function): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  msgName | string |  |
|  handler | Function |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
